Title: Red in Tooth and Claw
Plot: Nancy's attempt to raise money for Stevie's soccer fees tempts her back to her old ways, as she battles to finally leave the drug business for good. Jill uses Doug to get revenge on Andy. Shane and Angela go on a double date with Ouellette and his wife. Meanwhile, Silas's friendship with R.J. takes a strange turn.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language
